tool.name: SiteMapGenerator

param.name: layer
param.dialogReference:
The layer with selected features.

This layers selected features will be used as the overall and optional individual maps.

param.name: export_location
param.dialogReference: The output location for all the generated data, maps, and csv files.

param.name: buffer_dist
param.dialogReference:
The optional buffer distance to use around the selected features. Include the measurement and the units in this field.

Leave this field bank if you don't want to buffer the features and instead use the selected ones only.

Example Usage:

  • 100 Feet

  • 1 Miles

  • 10 Feet

param.name: title
param.dialogReference: The title to use on the overall map. To use this field, you have to first insert the Document Title.

param.name: individual
param.displayname: Include individual maps of selected features?
param.dialogReference: Check this box to generate individual maps for each selected feature.

param.name: title_field
param.displayname: Title Field (field to use as individual map document title)
param.dialogReference:
This field will be used to generate a title for each of the site maps.

For parcels, this field could be MAILADDR. To use this field in the mxd document, insert the Document Title into your layout.

tool.summary:
This tool uses the selected features to generate overall and individual maps of the selected features. It also exports a csv with the selected features.

It will dynamically update the Document Title for individual maps.
tool.usage:
1. Select the features that you'd like to use. This can be parcels, or any other feature layer

  2. Open the tool dialog and complete the fields

This tool can be used for:

  • Parcel Mailing Lists

  • Site Maps

  • Simple Section Maps

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
This tool uses the selected features to generate overall and individual maps of the selected features. It also exports a csv with the selected features.

It will dynamically update the Document Title for individual maps.
